deleteAccount.title: Deleting Your Data on KlavHub
deleteAccount.fullDeleteTitle: To delete your full account and all associated data:
deleteAccount.fullDeleteNote: This will permanently remove your account and all related data
deleteAccount.deleteDogBody: When you delete your dog's profile, the data is removed from the app and inaccessible. It is not visible to other users and no longer retained for display or processing.
deleteAccount.help: If you need help, contact us at:

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to KlavHub. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our app, KlavHub (the "App"). By using the App, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

dataWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
personalItems: If you sign in using Google, we may collect profile details as per their policies.
Any additional data you deliberately add to your profile, such as your dog's details and park interactions.
dataWeCollect.usageDesc: Information about how you interact with the App (e.g., features used, session duration).
dataWeCollect.deviceDesc: Device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers.
dataWeCollect.locationTitle: Approximate or precise location (only with your permission).
dataWeCollect.photosTitle: Photos and other content you upload to the App.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
items: Allow other dog parents to search for friends and view their dogs' pages. If you prefer to keep your page private, you can change this anytime in the profile settings.

sharing.title: Sharing Your Information
items: Service Providers – For analytics, hosting, or customer support.
Legal Authorities – If required by law or to prevent fraud.

security.title: Data Retention and Security
security.desc: We keep your data only as long as necessary for its intended purpose. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no online service is 100% secure, so use the App at your own risk.

delete.title: Deleting Your Data
delete.desc: You can delete your account anytime from the profile settings. For detailed instructions on how to delete your data, click here.

children.title: Children’s Privacy
children.desc: Our App is not intended for children under 13 (or 16 in some regions). We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.desc: We may use third-party services that collect data (e.g., Google Analytics, Supabase). Each third party has its own privacy policy:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.desc: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by updating the "Last Updated" date.

about.welcomeBody: KlavHub is built for dog lovers looking to find the best nearby dog parks and connect with friends.
about.helpBody: If you're experiencing issues with the app or have any suggestions, feel free to reach out at:
about.earlyBody: This app is just getting started, and your help growing the community is deeply appreciated. You can support Klavhub by joining the community, sharing with friends, adding details about your local dog park, and contributing missing parks.
about.inspiredByBody: My special dog Nina, the dog who doesn't go to dog parks.
about.specialThanks: Special thanks to: Kfir Arad, Rotem Koltz.
